contents.text: Thank you for calling Blackhawk Network in the East Bay, your partner in innovative gift card, digital payment, and loyalty solutions.
For personal gift card and digital payment services, press 1.
To purchase, reload, or send a personal gift card, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a personal gift card specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to purchase a digital gift card and send it right away.
I’d like to purchase and send a personal gift card to my spouse overseas.
Issue a new digital gift card via API and deliver it to my friend’s email
I want to purchase and send a $50 gift card to my granddaughter.
I want to purchase and send a digital gift card to a friend.

contents.text: For balance inquiries or transaction history, please press 2.
One moment please as we transfer you to balance and transaction support.

navigationGoals: I need to check the remaining balance and recent transactions on my personal gift card.
I need to check the remaining balance and recent transactions on my digital gift card.
Retrieve the balance and transaction history for my existing digital gift card
I need to check the balance and recent transactions on my gift card.
I’d like to check my gift card balance and review my recent transactions.

contents.text: For business and corporate program inquiries, press 2.
To discuss bulk ordering or corporate gift card programs, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to our corporate solutions team.

navigationGoals: I want to set up a bulk corporate gift card order for our employee rewards program.
I want to discuss placing a bulk order of gift cards for my veteran-run small business’s employee rewards.
Set up a bulk corporate gift card order with custom branding for an employee rewards program
I need to place a bulk order of 30 gift cards for my church group.
I’m arranging a bulk order of gift cards for an upcoming university event.

contents.text: For digital payment and loyalty platform integration support, press 2.
Please stay on the line while we reach our platform integration specialists.

navigationGoals: I need technical assistance integrating your digital payment and loyalty platform into our system.
I’d like information on integrating Blackhawk’s digital payment platform into my nonprofit’s donation system.
Integrate Blackhawk’s digital payment and loyalty API into our platform and troubleshoot webhook callbacks
I need help integrating digital payment and loyalty services into my small store.
I need assistance integrating your digital payment and loyalty platform into our application.
